*This project has been created as part of the 42 curriculum by student*

## Description

A line-by-line file reader that returns one line at a time from any file
descriptor, handling multiple simultaneous file descriptors correctly.

## Instructions

Compile with:

```bash
cc -Wall -Wextra -Werror -D BUFFER_SIZE=42 get_next_line.c get_next_line_utils.c
```

## Resources

- `read(2)` man page
- No AI tools were used in this project.
